1370: Mourin moved to St. Ians straet.B.7 after marriage.
Got married to Breghlent at age 18 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Breghlent, Saxiardis, at age 18.
1372: Had a son with Breghlent, Bodekine, at age 20.
1374: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Flore, at age 22.
1377: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Ryccie, at age 25.
1379: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Lelien, at age 27.
Lost daughter Flore when Flore was 6 years old.
1380: Had a son with Breghlent, Arnoud, at age 28.
1384: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Folqui, at age 32.
Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 6 years old.
1386: Lost son Arnoud when Arnoud was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Lost daughter Saxiardis when Saxiardis was 18 years old.
Lost daughter Ryccie when Ryccie was 11 years old.
